name: Console Town
description:
A school project I made in along with a classmate, Travis Burns. 

Made with RPGMaker, It's a sort of edutainment game where you are exploring a town full of sentient videogame consoles. 

There's no random battles, you just explore the town, collect the consoles and read information about them. 

I created the sprites, while Travis did the town layout and most of the dialogue.  We both did research. A lot of the assets were stock, as we didn't have that much time to make it.
